entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 2.

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High 6 except plus 2 along parts of the coast. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or freezing drizzle in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h.
